name: Loop (itch) (StronkTenk, hexxagon, nathanHansen, Jake Nguyen, xirothehero, BlastLad)
name_original: Loop (itch) (StronkTenk, hexxagon, nathanHansen, Jake Nguyen, xirothehero, BlastLad)
description:
How to Play:
  • Move - Hover your mouse in a direction for the Seamstress to follow
  • Drop thread - Hold LMB
  • Product orders will drop down from the top righthand corner
  • Use your thread to loop around the necessary materials to complete the product order
  • Thread will run out if you drop down too much thread, so keep an eye on the thread meter
  • Each order completed will add 5 seconds to the timer
  • Complete as many orders as possible before time runs out!
The Marmalads!

Robert Guan: Tailor of Technical Tidbits (Programming)

Nathan Hansen (SoundCloud): Song Stitcher (Audio)

Ali Kedwaii: Sound Seamstress (Audio)

Jake Nguyen: Material Maker (Art)

Sean O'Connor: Embroidery Engineer (Programming)

Karina Teruya (insta): Appliqué Artist (Art)
